content.raw:
Here's more detail on the failure from the email of the jenkins results:

~~~
FAILED:  VisualProperty.CastShadows

Error Message:
/var/lib/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia/gazebo/test/integration/visual.cc:142
Expected: (colorRatio) > (0.05), actual: 4.67565e-06 vs 0.05
~~~

I wonder if this test won't work on the linux jenkins machines, like `MainWindow_TEST` and a few others? We can test the `ENABLE_SCREEN_TESTS` variable before adding it in the CMakeLists.txt if so.
content.html:
Here's more detail on the failure from the email of the jenkins results:

FAILED:  VisualProperty.CastShadows

Error Message:
/var/lib/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia/gazebo/test/integration/visual.cc:142
Expected: (colorRatio) > (0.05), actual: 4.67565e-06 vs 0.05

I wonder if this test won't work on the linux jenkins machines, like MainWindow_TEST and a few others? We can test the ENABLE_SCREEN_TESTS variable before adding it in the CMakeLists.txt if so.
